abletive.presentation.widget

类 RecycleBin

  • java.lang.Object
    • abletive.presentation.widget.RecycleBin

  • public class RecycleBin
extends java.lang.Object
    The RecycleBin facilitates reuse of views across layouts. The RecycleBin has two levels of storage: ActiveViews and ScrapViews. ActiveViews are those views which were onscreen at the start of a layout. By construction, they are displaying current information. At the end of layout, all views in ActiveViews are demoted to ScrapViews. ScrapViews are old views that could potentially be used by the adapter to avoid allocating views unnecessarily.

    This class was taken from Android's implementation of android.widget.AbsListView which is copyrighted 2006 The Android Open Source Project.

    • 字段详细资料

      • activeViews

        private View[] activeViews
        Views that were on screen at the start of layout. This array is populated at the start of layout, and at the end of layout all view in activeViews are moved to scrapViews. Views in activeViews represent a contiguous range of Views, with position of the first view store in mFirstActivePosition.

      • activeViewTypes

        private int[] activeViewTypes

      • scrapViews

        private <any>[] scrapViews
        Unsorted views that can be used by the adapter as a convert view.

      • viewTypeCount

        private int viewTypeCount

      • currentScrapViews

        private <any> currentScrapViews

    • 构造器详细资料

        static View retrieveFromScrap(<any> scrapViews,
                              int position)

      • setViewTypeCount

        public void setViewTypeCount(int viewTypeCount)

      • shouldRecycleViewType

        protected boolean shouldRecycleViewType(int viewType)

      • getScrapView

        View getScrapView(int position,
                  int viewType)
        返回:
        A view from the ScrapViews collection. These are unordered.

      • addScrapView

        void addScrapView(View scrap,
                  int position,
                  int viewType)
        Put a view into the ScrapViews list. These views are unordered.
        参数:
        scrap - The view to add

      • scrapActiveViews

        void scrapActiveViews()
        Move all views remaining in activeViews to scrapViews.

      • pruneScrapViews

        private void pruneScrapViews()
        Makes sure that the size of scrapViews does not exceed the size of activeViews. (This can happen if an adapter does not recycle its views).
